#summary TrigpointingUK on Android.

= Introduction =

This application helps users of TrigpointingUK to find and log trigpoints using their mobile phone.


= Installation =

Right now, this code is very much pre-alpha, and not ready for end users to install.  If you want to run it, you'll need to ckeck it out of SVN and build it yourself.
